column1: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II
Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Secret Unit Deployment

Volgafront is a folio add-on to Columbia Games EastFront: The War in Russia, 1941-45.  It provides an eastern map extension of Russia so that a complete picture of the strategic possibilities during WWII in Germany's fight with the Soviet Union.  It also comes with an additional EastFront rulebook and a set of new scenarios that utilize the map extension directly.  EastFront: The War in Russia, 1941-45 is required to play with the VolgaFront map.  VolgaFront is also part of the EuroFront series.<br/...

Components: Block Wargames, Country: Russia, History: World War II (Eastern Front), Players: Two-Player Only Games, Players: Wargames with Rules Supporting Only Two Players, Rivers: Volga, Series: Front Series (Columbia)
